seedMenu.title: Place Seed
seedMenu.noSeed: You don't have any seed to place in a pot
seedMenu.putSeed: Click to put seed in the pot

shopMenu.confirmMessage: Are you sure you want to buy %s %x for **%s$**

textUI.carry:
Carry Plant  
 [ENTER] - Place on ground  
 [BACKSPACE] - Cancel

success.title: Success
success.potPlaced: You have successfully placed the pot
success.seedPlaced: You have successfully placed seed in a pot
success.wateredPlant: You have successfully watered the plant
success.fetilizedPlant: You have successfully fertilized the plant
success.sprayedPlant: You have successfully sprayed the plant
success.harvestedPlant: You harvested a plant and got x%s %s leaves.
success.destroyedPlant: You have successfully destroyed the plant
success.plantCarried: You have successfully moved the plant
success.plantFound: You have successfully copied the id plant
success.teleportedPlant: You have successfully teleported to the plant
success.deletedPlant: You have successfully deleted the plant

error.title: Error
error.maxPlants: You have the maximum number of pots placed
error.noShovel: You don't have shovel in your inventory
error.maxWater: Your plant has the maximum amount of water
error.noWater: You don't have destilled water to water the plant
error.maxFertilizer: Your plant has the maximum amount of fertilizer
error.noFertilizer: You don't have fertilizer to fertilize your plant
error.maxSpray: Your plant is sprayed to the maximum
error.noSplay: You don't have spray bottle to spray your plant
error.noCanister: You don't have canister to destroy plant
error.noMoney: You don't have enough money to purchase item
error.noPlant: There is no plant with the id you entered
error.cantHarvest: You can't harvest a plant because it hasn't grown
